name: FractalJ
short_description: FractalJ is an application designed to be an education tool for teaching fractals and chaotic dynamical systems. Fractals, complete bifurcation diagrams, orbit diagrams, iterated function systems as well as the Mandelbrot and Julia sets are provided.
